languages.text: {n}Глейто смотрит прямо на вас, из его груди доносится усиленный воксом устрашающий рык. Нервно переступив лапами, Глейто прижимает уши и склоняет голову набок, будто в недоумении.{/n}
{n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто смотрит прямо на вас, из его груди доносится усиленный воксом устрашающий рык. Нервно переступив лапами, Глейто прижимает уши и склоняет голову набок, будто в недоумении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

{n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito fixiert dich und stößt ein voxverstärktes Knurren aus. Dann legt er seine Ohren an und neigt den Kopf, als wäre er verwirrt.{/n}.
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito fixiert dich und stößt ein voxverstärktes Knurren aus. Dann legt er seine Ohren an und neigt den Kopf, als wäre er verwirrt.{/n}.

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Glaito sont rivés sur vous et un grognement amplifié s'élève du vox dans son poitrail. Il rabat ses oreilles et penche la tête sur le côté en trépignant nerveusement, comme pris de confusion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Glaito sont rivés sur vous et un grognement amplifié s'élève du vox dans son poitrail. Il rabat ses oreilles et penche la tête sur le côté en trépignant nerveusement, comme pris de confusion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトはまっすぐにあなたを見つめ、ヴォックスで増幅された唸り声を胸の奥から響かせた。グライトは足先を小刻みに動かしながら、耳を伏せ、首をかしげて困惑したような様子を見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトはまっすぐにあなたを見つめ、ヴォックスで増幅された唸り声を胸の奥から響かせた。グライトは足先を小刻みに動かしながら、耳を伏せ、首をかしげて困惑したような様子を見せた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito te mira fijamente y emite gruñido amplificado por voco desde su pecho. Sus patas se mueven bruscamente, y Glaito aplana las orejas y ladea la cabeza como si estuviera confuso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito te mira fijamente y emite gruñido amplificado por voco desde su pecho. Sus patas se mueven bruscamente, y Glaito aplana las orejas y ladea la cabeza como si estuviera confuso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托直直地瞪着你，胸腔的音阵装置发出了响亮的咆哮声。它的爪子紧张地抽搐着，竖起耳朵，将头歪向一侧，看起来似乎很困惑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托直直地瞪着你，胸腔的音阵装置发出了响亮的咆哮声。它的爪子紧张地抽搐着，竖起耳朵，将头歪向一侧，看起来似乎很困惑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doğrudan sana bakan Glaito'nun göğsünden voks destekli bir hırıltı yükseliyor. Patilerini tedirginlikle hareket ettirip kulaklarını yatırıyor ve şaşkınlıkla kafasını yana eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks straight at you, letting a vox-enhanced growl unfurl from his chest. Twitchily moving his paws, Glaito flattens his ears and tilts his head to the side as if puzzled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito doğrudan sana bakıyor, göğsünden vox destekli bir hırıltı yükseliyor. Patilerini tedirginlikle hareket ettirip kulaklarını yatırıyor ve kafasını şaşkınlıkla yana eğiyor.{/n}
